snippet: The Federal Reserve, required by law to put most of its profit in the government’s coffers, has contributed almost $323 billion in the last four years.
abstract: Federal Reserve reportedly paid $79.6 billion to Treasury Department in 2013 as Fed's enormous investment campaign to stimulate economic growth continues to generate windfall profits for taxpayers; Federal Reserve, required by law to put most of its profit in government’s coffers, has contributed almost $323 billion in last four years.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve, required by law to put most of its profit in the government’s coffers, has contributed almost $323 billion in the last four years.

headline.main: Fed Transferred $79.6 Billion in Earnings to the Treasury Last Year
headline.print_headline: Fed Transferred $79.6 Billion in Earnings to the Treasury Last Year
